movie.title: Brian Banks
movie.plot: A football player's dreams to play in the NFL are halted when he is wrongly convicted and sent to prison. Years later, he fights to clear his name within an unjust system.

events.title: Brian Banks' conviction for rape is overturned
Brian Banks is accused of rape
